General.Name: Sinar Mas Multiartha Tbk
General.Description: PT Sinar Mas Multiartha Tbk provides various financial services to individual and corporate clients in Indonesia. The company offers savings and current accounts; time deposits, deposit on call, and Syariah funding; treasury products, including trade finance, remittance, foreign exchange, and bond trading services; investment products, such as bancassurance and mutual funds; internet, mobile, and phone banking services; debit and credit cards; ATMs; and safe deposit boxes, travellers cheque, payroll, bill payment, and virtual accounts, as well as simas holiday plans. It also provides investment, working capital, multi-purpose, sharia, and other financing products; online/information technology-based money lending services; securities and commodity trading, securities administration bureau, general trading, property, real estate, insurance, information technology, venture capital, fund and asset management, digital finance, automotive, guarantee, forestry, and other services; and operates auction hall. The company was formerly known as PT Internas Artha Finance Company and changed its name to PT Sinar Mas Multiartha Tbk in February 1995. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Sinar Mas Multiartha Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Sinar Mas Cakrawala Persada.
General.Address: Menara Tekno Lt. 7, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10350
